title: BOC Approver wants to approve MJ transactions from the clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day concussion dl, Place on 15-Day dl, Place on 60-Day dl, Reinstate from dl, Rehabilitation Assignment, Transfer of Rehab, Transfer to 15-Day dl, Transfer to 60-Day DL, or Return from Rehab tx has been submitted to BOC for approval
AND a BOC Approver is logged in and sees the tx in the approvals widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the transaction in the Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Approve" button should be enabled
AND clicking the approve button should run any required field or "on approve" rules for the selected transactions
AND assuming no rules fail, then the system should update all of the selected transactions to have a status of "Approved"
AND the system should make all "On Approve" updates for all of the selected transactions

title: BOC Approver wants to reject MJ transactions from the clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day concussion dl, Place on 15-Day dl, Place on 60-Day dl, Reinstate from dl, Rehabilitation Assignment, Transfer of Rehab, Transfer to 15-Day dl, Transfer to 60-Day DL, or Return from Rehab tx has been submitted to BOC for approval
AND a BOC Approver is logged in and sees the tx in the approvals widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the transaction in the Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Reject" button should be enabled
AND clicking the approve button should run any required field or "on reject" rules for the selected transactions
AND assuming no rules fail, then the system should update all of the selected transactions to have a status of "Rejected"
AND the system should make all "On Reject" updates for all of the selected transactions

title: User wants Last Game Date to populate based on player's Last Game Stats
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to create a new Place on 7-Day Concussion DL tx for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the new tx
custom_expected:
THEN the "Last Game Date" field should be populated with the latest date that appears on the stats table for that player
AND if more than one date appears on the stats table, the most recent date should be used
AND all stats that appear on the the stats table should be used to populate the date
BUT if no stats appear for the player, the field should remain blank

title: User wants to be able to submit Place on 7-Day Concussion DL with Last Game Date blank
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to create a new Place on 7-Day Concussion DL tx for a player
AND no stats are available on the stats table for the player
custom_steps: WHEN user opens new tx
custom_expected:
THEN "Last Game Date" should not be a required field
AND the field should remain blank
AND user should be able to successfully submit the tx
AND verify DL Placement Date Business Rules #1.04 and 1.07 should not be checked

custom_steps: WHEN user opens the tx in edit mode
custom_expected: THEN BOC user should be able to edit Last Game Date field

custom_steps: WHEN user opens a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL in any state
custom_expected: THEN user should not be able to edit Last Game Date field even if they have permissions

title: BOC user wants to receive warning if attempting to approve Place on 7-Day Concussion DL tx without Last Game Date complete
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user is attempting to Approve a Place on Concussion 7-Day DL tx 
AND Last Game Date on the form is blank
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display message "Last Game Date has not been populated for the Player."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: User wants to receive error if  player they're attempting to place on 7-Day Concussion DL has stats from a game played on the Placement Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL tx exists for a player
AND selected player has stats on the stats tab for a game played on or after the placement date on the tx
AND Doubleheader Exception checkbox is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places where onSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN the system should check for all stats found on stats table
AND system should display message "Stats have been found for player on {game date the system found stats for as "mm/dd/yyyy"}."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) should ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: User wants to add new Authorized Signatory from a Place on 60-Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with edit capabilities for the Authorized Signatory Widget
AND user is viewing a Place on 60-Day DL tx in edit mode 
AND authorized signatory field contains a list of the Authorized Signatories with MJ Transactions checked off in the Auth Signatories widget, that belong to the Org displayed on the transaction
AND "New" link appears above the Authorized signatory field
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "New" link
custom_expected:
THEN a modal should be launched that allows user to enter a new Authorized Signatory for the player's Org
AND the checkbox associated with the form the user is adding a new signatory from should be auto checked and disabled.
AND the Save button should be disabled until all required fields have been populated.
AND clicking "Save" should add the authorized signatory to the system and close the modal, with the "Authorized Signatory" field pre-populated with the newly added Authorized Signatory
AND the Authorized SIgnatory should be added to the authorized signatory widget and should appear for the Org for all users that have permission to view that Org's Authorized Signatories
AND clicking Cancel should cancel the addition of the authorized signatory, and return the user to the form

title: Allow Clubs and BOC users to create a Place on 7-Day DL transaction from Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user wants to create a Place on 7-Day DL transaction for an MN player from Player History
AND user has navigated to a player's Player History Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Create New" button on Player's Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should be an option in the top-level dropdown
AND clicking "Transactions" option should cause "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons to be active
AND selecting "Minor" should limit the third and fourth levels to only Minor items
AND "Disabled List" should appear as an option under Major Transactions
AND "Place on 7 day DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown

title: User Selects "Place on 7-Day DL" option- no transaction exists within the last 10 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user has completed [C166607]
AND no Preliminary, Submitted, or Rejected transaction exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" option
custom_expected: THEN a new Preliminary transaction should open in edit mode

title: Earliest Reinstatement Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants the Earliest Reinstatement date calculated correctly on 7-Day DL transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user enters or changes the Placement Date on a Place on 7-Day DL transaction
custom_expected: THEN the system will calculate and display Earliest Reinstatement Date as the 8th day after the Placement Date (including the Placement Date)

title: Allow BOC user to submit a place on 7-Day DL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to submit a place on 7-Day DL to the BOC for approval
AND the form is in a preliminary or rejected status
AND the grey Submit button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN the system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery
AND the system should run  the On Submit rules check
AND once the rules have passed, the system should update the status of the transaction to "Submitted to BOC"
AND the system should  reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful submit blue notification
AND the system should create an entry in green font, with "From Org/Club" and "To Org/Club" fields, in the player's Player History [Code = DL07N, Description = Place on 7-day DL]
AND player's minor league roster status should change to "7-Day DL"

title: Allow Club user to submit a place on 7-Day DL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to submit a place on 7-Day DL to the BOC for approval
AND the form is in a preliminary or rejected status
AND the blue "Submit to BOC" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN the system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery
AND the system should run the On Submit rules check
AND once the rules have passed, the system should update the status of the transaction to "Submitted to BOC"
AND the system should reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful submit blue notification
AND the system should create an entry in green font, with "From Org/Club" and "To Org/Club" fields, in the player's Player History [Code = DL07N, Description = Place on 7-day DL]
AND player's minor league roster status should change to "7-Day DL"

title: Allow BOC user to receive Approval Item when a Place on 7-Day DL is submitted
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Place on 7-Day DL tx exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN transaction reaches a status of "Submitted to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - MN Transactions- Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from the Attachments column of the Approvals widget
AND any comments on the transaction should be displayed in the Comments column of the Approvals widget
AND any flags on the transaction should be displayed in the Flags column of the Approvals widget
AND player name should be a hyperlink in the Approvals widget
AND clicking on the player name will open the Player Profile (defaults to Player History tab) in the same window/tab
AND "Type" should be a hyperlink
AND clicking on the type hyperlink of a submitted transaction should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab.

title: Allow BOC user to reject a place on 7-Day DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day DL transaction has been submitted to BOC
AND grey "Reject" button is available (in view or edit mode)
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user clicks "Reject"
AND all On Save rules have passed or been overridden
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status should be updated to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification #78 should be displayed
AND item should be removed from the approvals clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be set to value in history prior to tx submission
AND pending player history entry should be removed

title: Allow BOC user to approve a place on 7-Day DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day DL transaction has been submitted to the BOC
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND blue "Approve" button is available
custom_steps:
WHEN the BOC user clicks "Approve"
AND all rules have passed or been overridden
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status should be updated to "Approved"
AND item should reloaded in view mode if it was in edit mode
AND a successful blue notification (#80) should be displayed that states the transaction was approved
AND item should be removed from the approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History should be updated: Code = DL07N Description = Place on 7-day Concussion DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields should be in black font
AND player's Major League Roster status should be set to 7-Day DL

title: Allow BOC user to reverse a Place on 7-Day DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day DL transaction has been submitted and approved for a player
AND BOC user sees a "Reverse" button in grey on the transaction
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user clicks "Reverse"
AND all required field and formatting checks are passed
custom_expected:
THEN successful reverse notification (#79) should be displayed
AND transaction status should be updated to "Reversed"
AND reversed transaction is displayed in Player History with "Voided": in front of transaction description (EX:"Voided: Selection to Major/Minor Outright”)
AND any action item generated for Club user is removed

custom_expected:

AND tx should be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches (unless BOC user specifically searches suppressed transactions), and any other place where it is visible on UI

custom_preconds:

AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN 7 Day DL transaction reaches an "Approved" state

title: User wants to submit a Place on Rehab Assignment tx to BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Place on rehabilitation assignment" tx

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode
AND system should display successful save blue notification #76
AND if player's pending MN roster status is 7-Day DL, set their pending roster status to Rehab 7-Day DL
AND if player's pending MN roster status is 60-Day DL, set their pending roster status to Rehab 60-Day DL
AND if player's pending MN roster status is Restricted, set their pending roster status to Restricted/Assigned.
AND if player's pending MN roster status is Suspended, set their pending roster status to Suspended/Assigned
AND system should create an entry in green font in Player's Player History: Code = REHAB, Description = Rehabilitation Assignment, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
AND an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - Minor Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from the attachments column of the Approvals Widget
AND any populated comments should be displayed in the comments column of the Approvals Widget
AND clicking Player Name hyperlink should open Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab
AND clicking Type hyperlink should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status should be updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = REHAB Description = Rehabilitation Assignment, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font.
AND if player's current MN roster status was 7-Day DL, set their roster status to Rehab 7-Day DL
AND if player's current MN roster status was 60-Day DL, set their roster status to Rehab 60-Day DL
AND if player's current MN roster status was Restricted, set their roster status to Restricted/Assigned
AND if player's current MN roster status was Suspended, set their roster status to Suspended/Assigned
AND player's Rehab Club should be set to the Assignment Club
AND "Club" field on the player profile should update to read "On Rehab With {Rehab Club}"

custom_preconds:

AND player's pending (on submit) or current (on Approve) MN Roster status is 7-Day DL or 60-Day DL
AND assignment date entered on tx is fewer than 5 days after the player's last Injury Date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A pitcher may only be placed on rehab {5} days after Injury Date. Current value: {1}." ({1} reflects the number of days that have currently passed since the player's last Injury Date up to the entered Assignment Date)
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User receives error if submitting Rehab Assignment too close to player's injury date - Position Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to "Submit" or "Approve" a "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx for a Position Player at MN level
AND player's pending (on Submit) or current (on Approve) MN Roster status is 7-Day DL or 60-Day DL
AND assignment date entered on tx is fewer than 3 days after the player's last Injury Date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A non-pitcher may only be placed on rehab {3} days after Injury Date. Current value: {1}." ({1} reflects the number of days that have currently passed since the player's last Injury Date up to the entered Assignment Date)
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: Receive error if submitting Rehab Assignment for a player that is not in classification of Rookie Advanced or higher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to Submit or Approve a Rehab Assignment tx for a player
AND player's pending (on submit) or current (on Approve) Minor League level of play is not RA, SA, 1F, 1A, 2A, or 3A,
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A Minor League player must be in a classification of Rookie Advanced or higher to be eligible for a Rehab Assignment."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction 
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction(BOC only)

title: Receive error if Rehab Club's level of play is not SA, R, or RA

custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Rehab level must be either R, RA, or short A"
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction 
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction(BOC only)

title: Receive error if submitting Rehab Assignment with Rehab Club that is the same as the player's pending club's level of play, or is higher than his current level of play

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Rehab level must lower than the player's current level of play"
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction 
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction(BOC only)

title: BOC receives error approving a tx with a placement date after current date
custom_preconds:

custom_expected:

AND user should see error "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."
AND clicking "Back" will close the modal and return user to the transaction

title: BOC approver wants to receive error if attempting to approve Rehab Assignment tx for a player with a pending tx with an earlier date

custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Approve"

title: BOC admin

title: Club admin - user's Club is "From Org" or "To Org"

title: Club basic - user's Club is "From Org" or "To Org"

custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Basic user
custom_expected:

BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to edit or change these transactions
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club admin - other clubs and BOC only tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user has Club admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view, create, or edit a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx
custom_expected:

AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all minor League transactions for minor League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org"
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to edit any BOC only tx at all

title: Club basic - other clubs and BOC only tx

title: User should be prevented from creating or viewing a tx if they do not have permissions

custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view or edit a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx
custom_expected: THEN user should not be able to view or edit transaction

title: User wants to view an existing Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Return from Rehab tx already exists for a player
AND BOC or Club user can see the transaction in the player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the transaction in the player history
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will open in view mode in the same window
AND all fields will match data discovery and wireframe
AND clicking grey "Close" button will return user to their entry point into the transaction
AND field Current Status will display in red if the transaction is in a preliminary state, green if pending and black for all other states.

title: User wants to create a new Return from Rehab tx from player history
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected Return from Rehab tx exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Minor" should limit third and fourth levels to only MN items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Minor Transactions
AND "Return from Rehab" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Return from Rehab" will cause the system to load a new preliminary transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to submit a Return from Rehab tx to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Return from Rehab" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode
AND system should display successful save blue notification #76
AND If the player’s pending MJ roster status is Rehab 60 Day DL, then set the player’s MJ pending roster status to 60 Day DL.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Rehab 7 Day DL, then it should be set to 7 Day DL.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Restricted/Assigned then it should be set to Restricted.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Suspended/Assigned then it should be set to Suspended.
AND system should create an entry in green font in Player's Player History: Code = RHBRT, Description = Return from Rehab, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
AND an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - Minor Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from the attachments column of the Approvals Widget
AND any populated comments should be displayed in the comments column of the Approvals Widget
AND clicking Player Name hyperlink should open Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab
AND clicking Type hyperlink should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: BOC user wants to be able to reverse a Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks grey "Reverse" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display relevant error or warning messages
AND successful reverse notification should display (message #79)
AND transaction status should update to "Reversed"
AND any action items generated by the transaction should be removed
AND reversed transaction should display in Player History with "Voided" in front of the transaction
AND user should see a "Suppress" button on the Reversed tx
AND player's Club, MJ and MN roster statuses, and level of play should update to their values from prior to the tx being approved

title: BOC user wants to be able to suppress a reversed Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a reversed "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to suppress the transaction
AND grey "Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC user searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from any other place it is visible on UI

title: BOC user wants to be able to reverse and suppress a Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an approved "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to "Reverse and Suppress" the transaction
AND grey "Reverse and Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Reverse and Suppress" from the dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will first be reversed
AND player's Club, MJ, and MN Roster statuses and level of play should be updated to their values from prior to transaction approval
AND transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC user searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from any other place it is visible on UI

title: BOC user wants to be prevented from reversing a Return from Rehab Assignment tx - Not latest approved tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
AND player has one or more approved transactions dated later than selected transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reverse" or "Reverse and Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error message "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."
AND clicking "Back" will close modal and return user to the transaction

title: Club user wants to receive notification when Return from Rehab tx is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the tx or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN "Return from Rehab" tx reaches an "Approved" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user wants to receive notification when Return from Rehab tx is rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player

custom_expected:

AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user wants to receive notification when Return from Rehab tx is reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND tx is not suppressed
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the tx or the club the player belongs to

custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: BOC User wants to edit existing Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is not in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form

title: User wants to save existing Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND transaction is not in post-Approval state
AND a user has opened the existing transaction in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display

title: User wants Last Rehab Date calculated correctly on Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to create a "Return from Rehab" tx for a player
custom_steps: WHEN "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx is loaded, saved, or goes through any state change
custom_expected:
THEN system should correctly calculate Last Rehab Date for the tx
AND Last Rehab Date should be displayed from the player's original Rehab Assignment
AND Last Rehab date should be calculated using the entered assignment date and the Number of Days for Rehab
AND if original Rehab Assignment has been extended, system should use the New Last Rehab Date that displays in the extensions section of original Rehab Assignment

title: Allow BOC user to see flag for any MN placements involving a concussion
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a MN Return from Rehab tx has been submitted for a player

custom_steps: WHEN BOC user views the form
custom_expected:
